problem.title: 针对训练3：绝对值方程分类讨论

steps.title: 确定临界点
steps.content:
$2x - 1 = 0 \Rightarrow x = \frac{1}{2}$

$x + 3 = 0 \Rightarrow x = -3$

将数轴分为三段：$x < -3$，$-3 \leq x < \frac{1}{2}$，$x \geq \frac{1}{2}$

steps.title: 分类讨论
steps.content:
① $x < -3$：$-(2x-1) + (-(x+3)) = 6 \Rightarrow -3x - 2 = 6 \Rightarrow x = -\frac{8}{3}$（不满足 $x < -3$）

② $-3 \leq x < \frac{1}{2}$：$-(2x-1) + (x+3) = 6 \Rightarrow -x + 4 = 6 \Rightarrow x = -2$（满足）

③ $x \geq \frac{1}{2}$：$(2x-1) + (x+3) = 6 \Rightarrow 3x + 2 = 6 \Rightarrow x = \frac{4}{3}$（满足）
